doc.title: Nogawa: ieat learns to eat Sushi Part 2
doc.text: Following/IN my/PRP$ Sushi/NN Enlightenment/NN with/IN Chef/NN Nogawa/NN ,/, I/PRP have/VBP now/RB set/NN out/IN on/IN a/DT mission/NN to/TO post/VB a/DT photo/NN catalog/NN of/IN the/DT various/JJ Sushi/NN that/WDT are/VBP available/JJ ./.
